Package danfulea.phys

Package used to perform various physics related tasks.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AmbientalBkgRetriever
    A simple interface for ambiental BKG fetching data!
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alpha_MC
    The main class for Monte-Carlo calculation of alpha detector efficiency.
    DoseSimCore
    Class for Monte Carlo simulation of radiation transport which is used in conjunction with MIRD5 Phantom class and XRay class to assess organ doses and effective dose for patients undergoing radiological examinations (radiodiagnostic - mammography, radiography and CT).
    GammaDetector
    Compute gamma detector efficiency using KERMA approximation.
    GammaRoi
    Handling gamma ROI (gamma spectrometry).
    HvlSolution Deprecated
    HvlUtil Deprecated
    Phantom
    This class simulates the human body using MIRD 5 mathematical phantom.
    PhysUtilities
    Several physics utilities including BATEMAN decay law.
    XRay
    Core class for X-Ray spectrum generator, HVL and filtration calculations!
    XRaySpectrum
    Build X-Ray spectrum.

Package danfulea.phys Description

Package used to perform various physics related tasks.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Dan Fulea
